info.name: Windows Defender ATP
info.description:
# Postman Collection of Endpoints for Windows Defender ATP App on Splunk SOAR.

- ### Prerequisite

The below mentioned are the required fields to use this collection. So, make sure that all these fields are set before running the request.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| tenant_id  | Tenant ID ( in environment variables) |
| client_id  | Client ID ( in environment variables) |
| client_secret |Client Secret ( in environment variables) |
| base_url | EWS URL ( in local variables) |

request.description:
This rest call get status of the event on a machine.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| event_id  | Event ID |

This rest call scan a device for virus.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id  | Device ID |

This rest call list of recently seen devices

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| top | Limit |

This rest call return statistics for the specified domain.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| lookBackHours | Hours to search back to get the statistics |

This rest call return statistics for the specified IP.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| lookBackHours | Hours to search back to get the statistics |

This rest call return statistics for the specified File.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| file_id | File hash |
| lookBackHours | Hours to search back to get the statistics |

This rest call Retrieve  a file information by identifier SHA1, or SHA256.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| file_id | Identifier of the file |

This rest call retrieve a collection of devices related to a given file hash (SHA1).

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| file_device_id | Identifier of the file |

This rest call retrieve a collection of devices related to a given user ID.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| user_id | ID of the user |

This rest call retrieve a collection of devices that have communicated to or from a given domain address.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| domain | Domain |

This rest call retrieve a collection of installed software related to a given device ID.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | Identifier of the device |

This rest call restrict execution of all applications on the device except a predefined set

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | Identifier of the device |
| comment | Comment |

This rest call retrieve a collection of all active Indicators.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| filter | Additional OData V4 filters to apply |
| top | Limit |

This rest call An advanced search query.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| Query | Query to fetch results |

This rest call retrieve a collection of discovered vulnerabilities related to a given device ID.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | Identifier of the device |

This rest call enable execution of any application on the device.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | Identifier of the device |
This rest call retrieve the organizational exposure score.
This rest call retrieve your Microsoft Secure Score for devices.

This rest call download a file from a device using live response.

If you want to Download the file then add `/GetLiveResponseResultDownloadLink(index=0)` at the last of rest url.


The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| file_live_res_id | ID of the event |

This rest call run a script from the library on a device using live response.

If you want to Download the file then add `/GetLiveResponseResultDownloadLink(index=0)` at the last of rest url.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| live_script_id | ID of the event |

This rest call retrieve missing KBs (security updates) by given device ID.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| kbs_id |ID of the device |

This rest call retrieve specific Alert by its ID.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| alert_id | ID of the alert |

This rest call list all logged in users on a machine.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | ID of the device |

This rest call list all alerts of a given type.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| input_type | Type of input |
| input_for_alert | Input filter of type Domain, File Hash and IP |

This rest call Quarantine a file.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id_for_file | ID of the device |

This rest call put a file to a device using live response.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | ID of the device |

This rest call quarantine the device.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | ID of the device |

This rest call unquarantine the device.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| device_id | ID of the device |

This rest call update properties of existing alert.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| alert_id | ID of the alert |

This rest call submit or update new indicator entity.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| title |Indicator alert title |
| description | Description of the indicator |
| indicatorType | Type of the indicator |
| indicatorValue | Identity of the Indicator entity |
| action | action will be taken if the indicator will be discovered in the organization |

This rest call delete an Indicator entity by ID.

The variable and its example value for the action are mentioned below.

| **Variable Name** | **Description** |
| ------ | ------ |
| del_indicator_id |Indicator ID to delete |
